title: pixel 2 xl shows as lg g watch in account
content:
i was trying to add the two factor auth to my account. when it asks me which device to select my phone is not there. so i went to the accounts devices section of myaccount.google.com and my phone, a pixel 2 xl, is listed as a lg g watch r. i have tried removing and re-adding the account on my phone, with no success, it just re appears an a lg g watch r. 

i have contacted google support, but they say they are limited? in what they can do and i should ask here?

my phone is unrooted running the latest beta of android Q. I have another pixel 2 xl that is also running the latest Q, and that one shows up in my account as a pixel 2.

picture of device list showing the phone as a watch
